mapper.select: SELECT PARTY_NO,PARTY_MASTER,USER_NICKNAME,USER_LEVEL,LEVEL_NAME,PARTY_COUNT,PARTY_OTTENG,OTT_KOR,PARTY_STARTDATE,PARTY_ENDDATE,PARTY_RULE,CEIL(PARTY_ENDDATE-SYSDATE)+1 AS ABLEDAYS, TO_NUMBER((SELECT COUNT(JOIN_PARTY) FROM PARTY_MEMBER WHERE PARTY_NO=JOIN_PARTY(+))) AS JOINEDMEMCTN, TO_NUMBER(PARTY_COUNT-TO_NUMBER((SELECT COUNT(JOIN_PARTY) FROM PARTY_MEMBER WHERE PARTY_NO=JOIN_PARTY(+)))) AS ABLEMEMNUM FROM PARTY JOIN OTT_TYPE ON(PARTY_OTTENG=OTT_ENG) JOIN USERINFO ON(PARTY_MASTER=USER_ID) JOIN USERLEVEL ON(USER_LEVEL=LEVEL_CODE) LEFT JOIN PARTY_MEMBER ON(JOIN_PARTY=PARTY_NO) WHERE PARTY_STATUS='Y' ORDER BY PARTY_NO DESC

SELECT PARTY_NO,PARTY_MASTER,USER_NICKNAME,USER_LEVEL,LEVEL_NAME,PARTY_COUNT,PARTY_OTTENG,OTT_KOR,PARTY_STARTDATE,PARTY_ENDDATE,PARTY_RULE FROM PARTY JOIN OTT_TYPE ON(PARTY_OTTENG=OTT_ENG) JOIN USERINFO ON(PARTY_MASTER=USER_ID) JOIN USERLEVEL ON(USER_LEVEL=LEVEL_CODE) WHERE PARTY_STATUS='Y' ORDER BY PARTY_NO DESC

SELECT PARTY_NO,PARTY_MASTER,USER_NICKNAME,USER_LEVEL,LEVEL_NAME,PARTY_COUNT,PARTY_OTTENG,OTT_KOR,PARTY_STARTDATE,PARTY_ENDDATE ,TRUNC(MONTHS_BETWEEN(PARTY_ENDDATE,SYSDATE)) AS DIFFMONTH,PARTY_RULE,CEIL(PARTY_ENDDATE-SYSDATE)+1 AS ABLEDAYS FROM PARTY JOIN OTT_TYPE ON(PARTY_OTTENG=OTT_ENG) JOIN USERINFO ON(PARTY_MASTER=USER_ID) JOIN USERLEVEL ON(USER_LEVEL=LEVEL_CODE) WHERE PARTY_NO = #{partyNo}
SELECT (SELECT COUNT(PARTY_NO) FROM PARTY_MEMBER WHERE PARTY_NO=JOIN_PARTY) FROM PARTY LEFT JOIN PARTY_MEMBER ON(PARTY_NO=JOIN_PARTY) WHERE PARTY_NO = #{partyNo} GROUP BY PARTY_NO, PARTY_MASTER
mapper.update: UPDATE PARTY SET PARTY_STATUS = 'N' WHERE PARTY_ENDDATE+1 < SYSDATE
